languages.text: {n}Над толпой поднимается веселый и злорадный гомон. Несколько пар рук вцепляется в скомороха явно с намерением затащить его на эшафот, но тот оказывается ловчее. Вывернувшись из хватки, скоморох молча бросается прочь, а по его следам несутся несколько преследователей.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Небольшая драка в толпе, скоморох убегает, за ним пара людей
Небольшая драка в толпе, скоморох убегает, за ним пара людей

languages.text: {n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Several pairs of hands grasp at the fool with the apparent intention of dragging him to the scaffold, but Bluff proves to be too slippery. Having broken free of their grip, the fool rushes away, with several onlookers in pursuit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Над толпой поднимается веселый и злорадный гомон. Несколько пар рук вцепляется в скомороха явно с намерением затащить его на эшафот, но тот оказывается ловчее. Вывернувшись из хватки, скоморох молча бросается прочь, а по его следам несутся несколько преследователей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Several pairs of hands clutch at the clown with the apparent intention of dragging him to the scaffold, but the mountebank proves to be too slippery. Having broken free of their grip, the jester rushes away, with several onlookers in pursuit.{/n}

{n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Several pairs of hands grasp at the fool with the apparent intention of dragging him to the scaffold, but Bluff proves to be too slippery. Having broken free of their grip, the fool rushes away, with several onlookers in pursuit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一阵欢快的幸灾乐祸声从人群中响了起来，好几双手立刻朝小丑伸了过去，显然准备把他拖到行刑台上。然而，闹闹的动作实在是太敏捷了。他挣脱了周围的人，逃开了，几个围观的居民在他身后紧追不舍。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Several pairs of hands grasp at the fool with the apparent intention of dragging him to the scaffold, but Bluff proves to be too slippery. Having broken free of their grip, the fool rushes away, with several onlookers in pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一阵欢快的幸灾乐祸声从人群中响了起来，好几双手立刻朝小丑伸了过去，显然准备把他拖到行刑台上。然而，闹闹的动作实在是太敏捷了。他挣脱了周围的人，逃开了，几个围观的居民在他身后紧追不舍。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una jubilosa ovación se extiende por la multitud. Varios pares de manos agarran al bufón con la aparente intención de llevarlo a rastras hasta el cadalso, pero Farol demuestra ser demasiado escurridizo y, tras zafarse de su presa, echa a correr perseguido por algunos de los asistentes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Several pairs of hands grasp at the fool with the apparent intention of dragging him to the scaffold, but Bluff proves to be too slippery. Having broken free of their grip, the fool rushes away, with several onlookers in pursuit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kalabalıkta neşeli bir alaycılık peyda oluyor. Birkaç çift el, görünüşe göre onu iskeleye sürükleme niyetiyle soytarıyı yakalıyor ama Kurusıkı çabucak ellerinden kurtuluyor. Kaçan soytarı, peşinde birkaç seyirciyle hızla ortamdan uzaklaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Several pairs of hands grasp at the fool with the apparent intention of dragging him to the scaffold, but Bluff proves to be too slippery. Having broken free of their grip, the fool rushes away, with several onlookers in pursuit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}陽気な笑いが群衆から起こる。複数の手がその道化を台上に連れて行こうと伸びるが、ブラフはとても掴みにくいようである。彼らの手を逃れると、道化は複数の野次馬に追われながら逃げ出す。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Several pairs of hands grasp at the fool with the apparent intention of dragging him to the scaffold, but Bluff proves to be too slippery. Having broken free of their grip, the fool rushes away, with several onlookers in pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}陽気な笑いが群衆から起こる。複数の手がその道化を台上に連れて行こうと伸びるが、ブラフはとても掴みにくいようである。彼らの手を逃れると、道化は複数の野次馬に追われながら逃げ出す。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Des vivats s'élèvent aussitôt de la foule, et plusieurs paires de mains se saisissent du bouffon dans l'intention manifeste de le traîner sur l'échafaud. Mais l'insaisissable Bluff réussit à leur échapper avant de détaler à toute vitesse, une poignée de spectateurs à ses trousses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Several pairs of hands grasp at the fool with the apparent intention of dragging him to the scaffold, but Bluff proves to be too slippery. Having broken free of their grip, the fool rushes away, with several onlookers in pursuit.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Des vivats s'élèvent aussitôt de la foule, et plusieurs paires de mains se saisissent du bouffon dans l'intention manifeste de le traîner sur l'échafaud. Mais l'insaisissable Bluff réussit à leur échapper avant de détaler à toute vitesse, une poignée de spectateurs à ses trousses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein hämisches Lachen breitet sich in der Menge aus. Zahlreiche Hände greifen nach dem Narren, um ihn auf das Schafott zu zerren, aber Bluff erweist sich als zu schlüpfrig. Nachdem er sich aus ihren Griffen befreit hat, ergreift der Narr, verfolgt von einigen Schaulustigen, die Flucht.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A cheerful gloating rises above the crowd. Nachdem er sich aus ihren Griffen befreit hat, ergreift der Narr, verfolgt von einigen Schaulustigen, die Flucht.{/n}
